Episodes.Title: Very Bad Things
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: Earl helps Joy try to get rid of a stolen delivery truck, which becomes harder when they discover that someone is still in the back.

Episodes.Title: Jump for Joy
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: Earl and Randy ask Catalina to return to her old job at the strip club, but they don't tell her that they need her to do it so that the club's owner will pay for Joy's bail.

Episodes.Title: Sticks & Stones
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: Earl makes up for teasing a mustached girl in school, and it forces him to confront his fear of taking his shirt off in public.

Episodes.Title: Larceny of a Kitty Cat
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: Randy has a crush on the next woman on Earl's list, so he pretends to be a cat lover. But based on Randy's past experiences as a poser, Earl knows that this one will end badly.

Episodes.Title: Van Hickey
Episodes.Writer: Gregory Thomas Garcia, J.B. Cook, Marc Singer
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: Earl has to get his old band back together to take care of an elderly man on his list. But it only brings out a nasty secret which ultimately forces Earl to marry Ralph's mom.

Episodes.Title: Made a Lady Think I Was God
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: Earl wants to make amends to an angry, bitter trailer park manager for playing a trick on her. But the trick caused her to change her life for the better, and the apology makes her even angrier than she ever was.

Episodes.Title: Mailbox
Episodes.Writer: Gregory Thomas Garcia, Kat Likkel, John Hoberg
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: Earl promises to help a man from the trailer park win the girl of his dreams, but he falls for her instead. And Joy gets mad at Darnell when she learns that he's in the Witness Protection Program.

Episodes.Title: Robbed a Stoner Blind
Episodes.Writer: Gregory Thomas Garcia, Kat Likkel, John Hoberg
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: Earl makes up for stealing an air conditioner from a stoner and winds up living on a commune for a week. The experience makes him environmentally conscious, which only frustrates him even more.

Episodes.Title: Born a Gamblin Man
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: Earl tries to make Kenny more masculine at his request, but he just winds up getting them addicted to gambling. His addiction causes Catalina to be deported, right before Randy was going to declare his love for her.

Episodes.Title: South of the Border: Part Uno
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: Earl and Randy go to Mexico to bring Catalina back and hopefully give Randy a chance to win her heart, but Earl's fear of flying causes unforeseen problems.

Episodes.Title: South of the Border: Part Dos
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: Earl inadvertently agrees to marry Catalina so that she can return to the U.S., which breaks Randy's heart.

Episodes.Title: Our 'Cops' Is On!
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: The gang fondly watches an episode of "Cops" in which they were featured.

Episodes.Title: Buried Treasure
Episodes.Writer: Gregory Thomas Garcia, Erika Kaestle, Patrick McCarthy
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: Earl tries to return a set of precious silverware he stole from the public library. But when he discovers that it's gone, Randy, Joy and Crabman each reveal their own secrets about the whereabouts.

Episodes.Title: Kept a Guy Locked in a Truck
Episodes.Writer: Gregory Thomas Garcia, Kat Likkel, John Hoberg
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: A guilty conscience forces Earl to have a funeral for the guy he and Joy found in the truck Joy stole. Unfortunately, however, he can't seem to find anyone who knew him.

Episodes.Title: Foreign Exchange Student
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: While Earl tries to help a former French foreign exchange student on his list, Randy finally declares his true love for Catalina. Catalina says she loves him too, but she really doesn't--she just doesn't want to hurt his feelings.

Episodes.Title: B.L.O.W.
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: Earl tries to correct a past wrong he did to Joy's half-sister, who is trying to become a professional wrestler and can't overcome her life-long hatred of Joy.

Episodes.Title: The Birthday Party
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: Earl tries to celebrate his good deeds at his birthday party, but his friends' reactions only makes him realize that he still has a long way to go to on his list.

Episodes.Title: Guess Who's Coming Out of Joy
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: We flashback to around the time when Earl Jr. was born, and as we do this, we witness Earl's first reactions to his second-born illegitimate child.

Episodes.Title: Harassed a Reporter
Episodes.Writer: Gregory Thomas Garcia, Brad Copeland, Barbie Adler
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: Earl and Randy work to cross #29 "Harrassed a Reporter" off the list; meanwhile, Randy embraces the true power of karma and the media as a way to get out of his brother's shadow.

Episodes.Title: Two Balls, Two Strikes
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: Richard Chubby dies, bringing Little Chubby to town to take over the family business. Meanwhile, when Earl tries to cross an item off his list, he learns the true meaning of sacrifice.

Episodes.Title: G.E.D.
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: Earl gets a taste of what it's like to teach juvenile delinquents when he asks his old high school teachers to help him get his G.E.D..

Episodes.Title: Get a Real Job
Episodes.Writer: Gregory Thomas Garcia, Patrick McCarthy, Erika Kaestle
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: Earl and Randy get jobs in the shipping department at an appliance store. But Earl really wants to work in the front as a salesman, which gets him in hot water with both his fellow shipping workers and the salesmen.

Episodes.Title: The Trial
Episodes.Writer: Gregory Thomas Garcia, Timothy Stack, Mike Mariano
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: Earl is a character witness for Joy's trial, but he soon learns that the only way Joy will get out of a conviction and her third strike is to falsely confess to the crime himself.
